Description_lang: Master Mathias Shaw is the espionage core of the Alliance. He advises the king on all matters of intel and strategy. He has agreed to an off-the-books alliance as long as you are a representative of the Uncrowned.
AuraDescription_lang: Mathias Shaw has mastered the ways of the Assassination rogue. He is the leader of SI:7 and a valuable ally.

name_blz.zh_TW: 勇士：馬迪亞斯‧肖爾大師
name_blz.zh_CN: 勇士：马迪亚斯·肖尔大师

description_blz.en_US: Master Mathias Shaw is the espionage core of the Alliance. He advises the king on all matters of intel and strategy. He has agreed to an off-the-books alliance as long as you are a representative of the Uncrowned.
description_blz.es_MX: El Maestro Mathias Shaw es el corazón del espionage de la Alianza. Asesora al rey en todos los asuntos de inteligencia y estrategia. Accedió a establecer una alianza informal, siempre y cuando tú representes a los Descoronados.
description_blz.pt_BR: O Mestre Mathias Shaw é o núcleo de espionagem da Aliança. Ele aconselha o rei em assuntos de inteligência e estratégia. Ele concordou com uma aliança por baixo dos panos desde que você seja um representante dos Destronados.
description_blz.de_DE: Meister Mathias Shaw ist das Herz des Spionagenetzwerks der Allianz. Er berät den König in allen Dingen, die Geheimdienst und Strategie betreffen. Er hat einem inoffiziellen Bündnis zugestimmt, solang Ihr als Repräsentant der Ungekrönten fungiert.
description_blz.en_GB: Master Mathias Shaw is the espionage core of the Alliance. He advises the king on all matters of intel and strategy. He has agreed to an off-the-books alliance as long as you are a representative of the Uncrowned.
description_blz.es_ES: El maestro Mathias Shaw es el alma del espionaje de la Alianza. Aconseja al Rey en asuntos de inteligencia y estrategia. Ha accedido a una alianza extraoficial siempre y cuando representes a los Descoronados.
description_blz.fr_FR: Maître Mathias Shaw est le pilier du réseau d’espionnage de l’Alliance. Il conseille le roi pour toutes les affaires ayant trait au renseignement et à la stratégie. Il a accepté de négocier une alliance officieuse avec les Sans-Couronne à la seule condition que vous restiez à la tête du groupe.
description_blz.it_IT: Il Maestro Mathias Shaw è il nucleo dello spionaggio dell'Alleanza. Egli consiglia il re su tutte le questioni tattiche e di strategia. Ha accettato un'alleanza segreta solo finché sarai rappresentante dei Senza Corona.
description_blz.ru_RU: Мастер Матиас Шоу – главный шпион на службе Альянса. Он является одним из советников короля, и его рекомендации по части стратегического планирования и разведки очень ценны. Он согласился заключить негласный союз, пока вы представляете Некоронованных.
description_blz.ko_KR: 단장 마티아스 쇼는 얼라이언스 첩보전의 핵심으로, 국왕에게 정보와 전술에 관한 모든 사안을 조언합니다. 당신이 무관의 연맹을 대표하는 한, 마티아스 쇼는 비공식적으로 당신에게 협조할 것입니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 馬迪亞斯‧肖爾大師是聯盟的諜報中樞。他對國王提供所有情資和策略方面的諮詢。他也同意，只要你是無冕者的代表，就和你私下結盟。
description_blz.zh_CN: 马迪亚斯·肖尔大师是联盟里间谍活动的核心人物。在情报和战略方面的一切事物上，他都为国王提供建议。他已经同意，只要你是无冕者的代表，就可以达成一个私下的联盟。
